In the web version of Quest, in the Ask.Tell tab I cannot paste text into text messages  - they disappear if I leave that tab and come back. However, if I go into Code view and paste the text there, it sticks.

Is there a way to insert hyperlinks to a web page within an Ask/Tell print message? When I try it I get a failure message and the entire game reloads.

Is there a way to NOT show the ask verb in the Places & Objects section? I'm using the "Ask X about Y" typed-in command and that works great, but if you click on ask under the Places and Objects section, it tries to locate another object for the user to click on - not what I want to have happen.
